name: Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story
name_original: Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story
description:
These are not executables. Each option is the zip file with the executable inside alongside the other files. 

The windows file is a zip file for: 

1.  Download the zip file to a readable folder, so like documents.

2. Decompress the folder

3. Double click the .exe file 

4. Enjoy the game 

For Mac OS X:

1. Download the zip file

2. Decompress the zip file 

3. Double click the executable 

Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story is a tale of myth, mayhem, magic, and the Fae. This is the first episode in a four-episode series that will help build the lore of the game. All four of the episodes will be free releases. I hope you enjoy them and thank you for playing. 

Even though there is a donation button, please do not feel obligated to donate. If you do, however, thank you very much all proceeds will go to improving the main game and upcoming episodes of the game. 

One thing that came back from beta testers was that an error would pop up when they changed the sound and this was called an EPERM error. If this happens the solution is to change the location of the change on the hard drive as it has tried to write something onto the file and it can't. The error resolves itself when the program is moved to a readable directory or drive. 

Any issues or questions please feel free to contact me through Twitter at @Kallisti777.
